  1. Command Line
  2. Map of Subcommands

Map of Subcommands


The whole tree of subcommands for bdk-cli can be mapped like so:

bdk-cli ---| help
           | repl
           | key ------| help
                       | generate
                       | restore
                       | derive
           | wallet ---| help
                       | broadcast
                       | bump_fee
                       | combine_psbt
                       | create_tx
                       | extract_psbt
                       | finalize_psbt
                       | get_balance
                       | get_new_address
                       | list_transactions
                       | list_unspent
                       | policies
                       | public_descriptor
                       | sign
                       | sync
